professional.title: Professional
professional.heading:
NEOS Corporation is
a group of experts with abundant expertise.
professional.description:
We have assembled the industry's top talent
by recruiting professionals from various fields.
Through independent team structures,
we pursue professional business
with enhanced expertise.

humanism.title: Humanism
humanism.heading:
At the core of NEOS Corporation
lies people.
humanism.description:
Rather than being a company focused solely on business,
we pursue a corporate culture based on humanism
where warm relationships flow between people,
allowing everyone to prosper together
in mutual growth.

global.title: Global
global.heading:
NEOS Corporation's competitive advantage
is our global network.
global.description:
We have already proven our capabilities
through years of business partnerships
with global companies and media production.
Based on our overwhelming global network,
we actively support overseas expansion
through meticulous strategy and collaboration.

about.title: About neos
about.subtitle:
As a leader in the advertising and video market connecting Korea and Japan,
we are creating a new future

content.paragraph1: NEOS Corporation has successfully led the role as a pioneer that directed Japan's advertising market, the nearest neighboring country, to the domestic market within the rapidly changing advertising video market, serving as a bridgehead connecting Korea and Japan. Beyond this, through continuous monitoring and communication, we have reached an influential position in the advertising video production market through close networks and extensive business positioning between Korea and Japan.
content.paragraph2: NEOS Corporation established a management business division in 2010 and launched NEOS Entertainment as a subsidiary in 2013. We provide the best services to advertisers by building quality infrastructure with influential actors and utilizing and integrating new businesses. We are also creating an environment where capable actors can be nurtured, increasing recognition within the industry.
content.paragraph3: In 2018, NEOS Corporation established neostory, a new content business division, through partnerships with leading creators in Japan and Asia in line with the trends of 'Korean Wave' and 'Content'. In 2021, we established NEOSTORY Corporation.
content.paragraph4: We will create content such as internet comics and novels called webtoons and visualize them to collaborate with various people and present them to the world.
content.paragraph5: The NEOS Group will continue to play a leading role in new markets that have never been experienced before.

neosEntertainment.description: As a subsidiary of NEOS, it is an entertainment company specializing in building quality infrastructure through influential actor groups and providing systematic actor development and management services.

neostory.description: A content production company specializing in planning and producing various contents such as webtoons and novels, and developing global content business through simultaneous serialization in Korea and Japan.
